main event: A bright bluish-green glow appeared in the NE, moved toward the witness, stopped suddenly, changed direction by 90 degrees, and then disappeared behind trees.
interesting points: The sighting was reported at approximately 3:15 AM and lasted for about 1 second., The object was described as having a reddish-green glow., The object was estimated to be at an altitude of about 5000 feet., Witnesses described the object as the size of a twenty-five cent piece held at arm's length., Weather conditions during the sighting were reported to be clear.
witness description: Witness described the object as bright and flat with colors flashing.
